QuestData.Title: Robbing Robbers of Robbers
QuestData.Description: Ah, a $c. I could make good use of your skills.$b$bA convoy was struck just up the road by a band of marauding saurok. These marauders made off with some... merchandise... her ladyship, the Madam Goya, had a mind to sell.$b$bOne does not steal from her ladyship.$b$bIf you recover these items I will gladly provide you a finders fee.
QuestData.RewardText: Ah, our merchandise. Madam Goya will be pleased. You have the gratitude of her ladyship.
